title: Betting the Bills But Loving Patrick Mahomes...
description:
Domonique and Charlie get into arguably the best two matchups we'll see all season: Bills/Chiefs and Cowboys Eagles. Then, they get into a little CFB with Alabama vs. Tennessee questioning whether or not this game will determine the Heisman trophy winner. We wrap up with Tua returning to practice and a little betting for the non-betters.
